name: Chess Trivia 2
description:
Chess Trivia 2 - Mating Season! is a game to test your chess knowledge.

Be sure to check out Chess Trivia 1.

Credits:

Engine used is the javascript program JQuiz.

Text font is Roboto Slab. Thank you, Christian Robertson and Google Fonts.

Chess diagram images made with Arena.

Other images from PNGGURU.
